headline: American Express Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend
summary: NEW YORK, June 17, 2025--The Board of Directors of American Express Company (NYSE: AXP) declared a regular quarterly dividend of $0.82 per common share, payable on August 8, 2025, to shareholders of record on July 3, 2025.

raw.headline: American Express Declares Regular Quarterly Dividend

headline: JPMorgan Chase is hiking the annual fee of its popular Sapphire card by 45%
summary: JPMorgan Chase is hiking the annual fee of its popular Sapphire Reserve credit card by 45% as part of a major overhaul to attract high-spending millennials.

headline: JPMorgan Hikes Sapphire Reserve Fee to $795 in Card Overhaul
summary: (Bloomberg) -- JPMorgan Chase & Co. will hike the annual fee on its popular Sapphire Reserve credit card to $795 and launch a similarly priced version for businesses as part of an overhaul marking the biggest US bank’s latest volley in the ultra-competitive world of premium credit cards.Most Read from BloombergSecurity Concerns Hit Some of the World’s ‘Most Livable Cities’As Part of a $45 Billion Push, ICE Prepares for a Vast Expansion of Detention SpaceAs American Architects Gather in Boston, R
